Posts.Content: hi dreamcheif thankyou for reply . i did not get a copy of my results wish i had off, i did find a paper to say i m er positive. they told me after my masactomy my grade went from a 2 to a 3 and bigger than what they thought it is 8cm idc cancer and stage is 2 and isplated lymp nodes but they did say they got all cancer,i didnt want chemo as i hear so much bad about it and maybe they can offer something else when i see ongolgist on wednesday, i ve got two young kids and on my own and want to be there for my kids and being ill on chemo was a no and i have so much hair i don t want to lose, i had a look at that predict tool and its given me more food for thought. i will ask about onotype test and see if i can get it i pray they say don t need chemo i do have to think about it thankyou dreamcheif
Posts.Title: isolated cells in nodes

Posts.Content: hither thankyou for yourr reply hair shold be the least of my worries but i will  try the cold cap if i do it and see what happens i too am a single parent and having chemo can take alot out of you i ve got two kids i need to take care of, i hope all goes well on the journey through this and yes mums help community group is agreat idea as so many of us who need it and sometimes it s just not there thankyou x
Posts.Title: isolated cells in nodes

Posts.Content: hi can anyone tell me what the isolated cells are in lymph nodes surgeon said nothing to worry about as they came up on 2 of my lymph nodes they took 4 altogether and i m still negative in nodes. surely if even one cell in there makes it positive? can any one tell me please thankyou sinead
Posts.Title: isolated cells in nodes

Posts.Content: hi sarah thankyou for reply glad you managed to keep your hair. how bad is cold cap and wondering do most people not were it, i wish you well on this cancer journey x
Posts.Title: isolated cells in nodes

Posts.Content: thankyou dreamchief for all this info defo take all in. i did call my nurse today and see if i can get a copy of the pathlogy report and take it from there, so much too think abou tand if oncotype say i do need it i will now have it i think , as i do want to be a grandma and live for many years and yes my hair will grow back but just thinking about chemo makes me feel sick lol, mykids seeing me ill and no hair is not nice either but i gotta push past it and think about the bigger picture,                                                                                                                                                 sinead x
Posts.Title: isolated cells in nodes

Posts.Content: hi jane i have the grade 3 and the more i read the more i m warming towards chemo so afrid of losing my hair it is long and very thick think it will be more depressing even more so than losing a breast soons daft but that how i feel, gonna try this cap i here people talking if t have test and say recurrance chances are high i ve got kids i want to see grow up. how long does 1 chemo session take? and did you put on weight? all aworry and the thought of been un well makes me think is it worth it and agin i know it is because of my kids hope i m making sense thank you for your reply x

Posts.Title: isolated cells in nodes

Posts.Content: hi clarefairey i m grade 3 er plus and her 2 neg also part way through my chemo and also was scared i had the negative and not positive one but now thank god more at ease with it i also had negative node only isolated cells which means i m stage 2,  tamoxfin is the drug i ll be on after radiotherapy, hope all goes wellwith your treatment
